description: Single storey rear wraparound extension (following demolition of existing extension)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Proposed Floor plans and elevation drawing no.CI002 V2 dated October 2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18).
| No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18) and policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
